languages.text: "Фиксирую богохульства шестой, седьмой и восьмой категорий в облачении данного дикаря. Демонтаж и взаимодействие с телами священных машин разрешены только просвещенным техножрецам. А грубая имитация Истинной плоти путем нанесения на кожу рисунков является кощунственной насмешкой".

"I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."
languages.original_text: "Фиксирую богохульства шестой, седьмой и восьмой категорий в облачении данного дикаря. Демонтаж и взаимодействие с телами священных машин разрешены только просвещенным техножрецам. А грубая имитация Истинной плоти путем нанесения на кожу рисунков является кощунственной насмешкой".

traits.locale_text: "I am recording Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is sacrilegious mockery."

"I am recording Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is sacrilegious mockery."

"I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight heresies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

"I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight heresies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

languages.text: 「この部族民の衣服について、カテゴリー6、7、8の冒涜を記録。啓示を受けた技術司祭だけが、聖なる機械の躯体を解体し、それと対話する権限を持っています。真の肉体を雑にまねて肌に色を塗るなど、不敬な愚弄行為だ」
languages.original_text: "I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

traits.locale_text: 「この部族民の衣服について、カテゴリー6、7、8の冒涜を記録。啓示を受けた技術司祭だけが、聖なる機械の躯体を解体し、それと対話する権限を持っています。真の肉体を雑にまねて肌に色を塗るなど、不敬な愚弄行為だ」
「この部族民の衣服について、カテゴリー6、7、8の異端を記録。啓示を受けた技術司祭だけが、聖なる機械の躯体を解体し、それと対話する権限を持つ。真の肉体を雑にまねて肌に色を塗るなど、不敬な愚弄行為だ」

languages.text: “在这个部落民的祭服上，我发现了第六、七、八类异端亵渎恶行。只有智慧的技术神甫才有权拆除神圣机器的躯壳，并与之互动。在皮肤上涂鸦，粗制滥造地模仿实肉，这样的行为无疑是亵渎的嘲弄。”
languages.original_text: "I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

traits.locale_text: “在这个部落民的祭服上，我发现了第六、七、八类异端亵渎恶行。只有智慧的技术神甫才有权拆除神圣机器的躯壳，并与之互动。在皮肤上涂鸦，粗制滥造地模仿实肉，这样的行为无疑是亵渎的嘲弄。”
“在这个部落民的祭服上，检测到了第六、七、八类异端行为。只有智慧的技术神甫才有权拆除神圣机器的躯壳，并与之互动。在皮肤上涂鸦，粗制滥造地模仿实肉，这样的行为无疑是亵渎的嘲弄。”

languages.text: « Détection de blasphèmes de catégorie six, sept et huit dans la tenue vestimentaire de cet homme. Seuls les technoprêtres éclairés sont autorisés à démanteler et interagir avec les corps des machines sacrées. Et recouvrir sa peau d'imitations grossières de la chair véritable est une insulte. »
languages.original_text: "I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

traits.locale_text: « Détection de blasphèmes de catégorie six, sept et huit dans la tenue vestimentaire de cet homme. Seuls les technoprêtres éclairés sont autorisés à démanteler et interagir avec les corps des machines sacrées. Et recouvrir sa peau d'imitations grossières de la chair véritable est une insulte. »

languages.text: «Detecto blasfemias de categoría seis, siete y ocho en las vestiduras de este miembro de la tribu. Solo los tecnosacerdotes iluminados tienen autorización para despiezar e interactuar con los elementos de las máquinas sagradas. Además, decorarse la piel con imitaciones burdas de verdadera carne se considera una burla profana».
languages.original_text: "I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

traits.locale_text: «Detecto blasfemias de categoría seis, siete y ocho en las vestiduras de este miembro de la tribu. Solo los tecnosacerdotes iluminados tienen autorización para despiezar e interactuar con los elementos de las máquinas sagradas. Además, decorarse la piel con imitaciones burdas de verdadera carne se considera una burla profana».

languages.text: "Ich registriere in den Gewändern dieses Stammesmannes Blasphemie der Kategorien 6, 7 und 8. Nur erleuchtete Techpriester sind autorisiert, die Körper heiliger Maschinen zu zerlegen und mit ihnen zu interagieren. Und die Haut mit kruden Imitationen Wahren Fleischs zu bemalen, ist blasphemischer Spott."
languages.original_text: "I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

traits.locale_text: "Ich registriere in den Gewändern dieses Stammesmannes Ketzerei der Kategorien 6, 7 und 8. Nur erleuchtete Techpriester sind autorisiert, die Körper heiliger Maschinen zu zerlegen und mit ihnen zu interagieren. Und die Haut mit kruden Imitationen Wahren Fleischs zu bemalen, ist blasphemischer Spott."

"Ich registriere in den Gewändern dieses Stammesmannes Ketzerei der Kategorien 6, 7 und 8. Nur erleuchtete Techpriester sind autorisiert, die Körper heiliger Maschinen zu zerlegen und mit ihnen zu interagieren. Und die Haut mit kruden Imitationen Wahren Fleischs zu bemalen, ist blasphemischer Spott."

languages.text: "Kabile üyesinin giysilerinde Altıncı, Yedinci ve Sekizinci Kategori dine aykırılıklar kaydediyorum. Kutsal makinelerin gövdelerini söküp onlarla etkileşime geçme iznine yalnızca aydınlanmış Tekno Rahipler sahiptir. Derinin Salt Suret'i taklit edecek şekilde boyanması ise din dışı bir alaycılıktır."
languages.original_text: "I am registering Category Six, Seven, and Eight blasphemies in this tribesman's vestments. Only enlightened Tech-Priests are authorised to dismantle and interact with the bodies of sacred machines. And painting the skin in crude imitation of True Flesh is a profane mockery."

traits.locale_text: "Kabile üyesinin giysilerinde Altıncı, Yedinci ve Sekizinci Kategori kâfirlikler kaydediyorum. Kutsal makinelerin gövdelerini sökme ve onlarla etkileşime geçme iznine yalnızca aydınlanmış Tekno Rahipler sahiptir. Derinin Salt Suret'i taklit edecek şekilde boyanması ise din dışı bir alaycılık."
